class.name: AbstractFeatureEntity
class.comment: Storage of the features (OfInterest). A feature represents the observed location, route, or area. As examples, the location of the weather station or the water level location, a ferry (Cuxhaven-Helgoland) or a lake of interest.

column.name: feature_id
column.comment: PK column of the table

column.name: discriminator
column.comment: Indicator used by Hibernate to map value specific entities (e.g. of a WaterML 2.0 MonitoringPoint) which are stored in separate tables.

column.name: fk_format_id
column.comment: Reference to the featureType in the format table. Required by the SOS to identify the typ of the feature, e.g. http://www.opengis.net/def/samplingFeatureType/OGC-OM/2.0/SF_SamplingPoint.

column.name: identifier
column.comment: Unique identifier of the feature which is used for filtering. Should be a URI, UUID. E.g. http://www.example.org/123, 123-321

column.name: fk_identifier_codespace_id
column.comment: The codespace of the feature identifier, reference to the codespace table.

column.name: name
column.comment: The human readable name of the feature.

column.name: fk_name_codespace_id
column.comment: The codespace of the feature name, reference to the codespace table.

column.name: description
column.comment: A short description of the feature

column.name: xml
column.comment: The XML encoded representation of the feature.

column.name: url
column.comment: Optional URL to an external resource that describes the feature, e.g. a WFS

column.name: geom
column.comment: The geometry/location of feature

column.name: fk_child_feature_id
column.comment: Reference to the child feature in feature table.

column.name: fk_parent_feature_id
column.comment: Reference to the parent feature in feature table.

set.name: parameters
set.comment: Storage of relations between feature and related parameter

column.name: fk_feature_id
column.comment: The reference to the feature in the feature table

column.name: fk_parameter_id
column.comment: The reference to the parameter in the feature parameter

column.name: feature_i18n_id
column.comment: PK column of the table

column.name: fk_feature_id
column.comment: Reference to the feature table this internationalization belongs to.

column.name: locale
column.comment: Locale/language specification for this entry. ISO 639 Codes (http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php)

column.name: name
column.comment: Locale/language specific name of the feature

column.name: description
column.comment: Locale/language specific description of the feature
